assets.blurb: An simple static web root, will not install on top of CloudOs
assets.description: An alternate web root for certain minimal servers that do not run their own CloudOs

doc_root.label: Document Root
doc_root.info: Filesystem path to the web root directory

digest_auth.realm.label: Digest Auth Realm
digest_auth.realm.info: Optional. Realm name to be displayed when requesting authentication

digest_auth.user.label: Digest Auth User
digest_auth.user.info: Optional. Require HTTP Digest Auth with this user name

digest_auth.password.label: Digest Auth Password
digest_auth.password.info: Optional. Require HTTP Digest Auth with this password
